author: Seren Morris
title: Alabama Stay-at-Home Order Rules Explained As Coronavirus Cases Pass 2,000
description: "We've got to take this order dead serious; otherwise, the fact is more people will end up dying," said Governor Kay Ivey.
content:
Alabama Governor Kay Ivey issued a statewide stay-at-home order over the weekend. Until then, it was one of four states that had more than 1,000 confirmed cases of the coronavirus yet to implement such an order.
Alabama had 2,006 confirmed cases and 53 death… [+7644 chars]
